Method Detail

substitute

public Expression substitute(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)

Substitutes any Expressions within this Expression that appear as keys in the Map given with their respective keys. Returns a new Expression and leaves this Expression unchanged.

Parameters:
map - a Map relating searched keys to their replacement values
Returns:
a new Expression with the given substitution performed

replace

protected void replace(Expression find,
                       Expression repl)

A helper function for substitute that completes the request

Parameters:
find - an Expression for which this Expression is searched
repl - an Expression with which the searched value will be replaced
